title: Beachfront Land in Wadduwa
details: Beachfront land with little over 100ft beachfront, approx. 240x35 m in dimension (rectangular shape land), seeding coconut trees, close proximity to Wadduwa town/railway station/main road and in a developing beach area for tourism. One of the few large lands readily available for sale. Genuine buyers and brokers with genuine buyers are most welcome. Price negotiable.
